The paragraph is not about any specific diseases. It is only describing an experimental study on the effects of progesterone treatment on arrhythmogenicity of bupivacaine, which refers to the ability of bupivacaine to cause irregular heart rhythms. However, arrhythmogenicity itself is not considered a disease but rather a property or condition that can lead to various arrhythmias, which are diseases. Therefore, arrhythmogenicity is not included as a disease entity in this table.
